title: DESIGNED TO MEET YOUR EVERY DESIRE!
description: Urbanrise The World of Joy Launching 1, 2 & 3 BHK Premium Gated Community Apartments at Siruseri, OMR with 150+ Amenities.

title: ― Overview ―
subTitle: About world of joy
listItem1: Urbanrise The World of Joy constructed in an alluring green environment spread over 10.13 acres of land these aspirational Siruseri flats built with the latest MIVAN technology are all about living life king size. Strategically located just 10 minutes from Sholinganallur.
listItem2: The 43,000 sq.ft magnificent clubhouse offers an array of jaw dropping amenities right from Work, Workout to gaming and grooming, the banquet hall offers the perfect space and ambience for parties, the co-working spaces and board rooms are a boon to residents working from Home.

title: ― Features ―
subTitle: Project Highlights
highLights: The World of Joy has created a buzz in the city, setting new standards of futuristic living.
Located at Siruseri, one of Asia's Largest IT Parks and Chennai’s fastest growing commercial and residential hub.
75,000 Sq. Ft. of Never before Rooftop Amenities
12,000 Sq. Ft. Urbanrise Genius - Children's Learning Hub
Over 1 Acre of Large Park with Amenities for Everyone in the Family

amenities.title: Kid's Play Area
amenities.description: One of the Asia’s Largest IT Park. Fastest growing Residential & Commercial locality of Chennai that will set you on a whole new lifestyle orbit.

amenities.title: Swimming Pool
amenities.description: There is no limit to the happiness that awaits you at The World of Joy. Mini theatre, Barbeque & Party Area, Viewing Decks, Game Zone, Yoga Decks, Green Dining and More.

amenities.title: Multipurpose lawn/Party Space
amenities.description: OMR’s biggest Cosmo clubhouse unlimited ways to unwind. Swimming pool, Clubhouse Lounge, Gym, Banquet Hall, Co-working Spaces, Supermarket, Board Games Room and More.

amenities.title: Billards Room
amenities.description: A great place to work out and also for parents to play with their kids. Joy, play a game of badminton, work those brains with a game of life size chess – It’s all right here!

amenities.title: Toddler's Play Area
amenities.description: A well designed Children’s learning hub – Urbanrise Genius ensures within the community will ensure the Children won’t have to go anywhere else for the tuition classes.

amenities.title: Gymnasium
amenities.description: Find happiness in the great outdoor – Mini Soccer Field, Basketball Court, Outdoor Gym, Cricket Practice Nets, Amphitheatre, Table Tennis, Gazebo, Hammock Park and More.

amenities.title: Amphitheatre with stage
amenities.description: Strong homes built using Mivan Technology – High Strength & Superior Quality, Speedy construction, More soundproof for privacy, No cracks & less repair works and more.

amenities.title: Jacuzzi
amenities.description: Close proximity to everything you'll ever need - restaurants, schools, colleges, hospitals, malls and more.

facilities.facility: BEST EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTES IN THE VICINITY
listAndTime: South Indian Education Welfare Society School - 8 mins
National Kannada Education Society High School - 9 mins
